documents.document: @Ilaeria surely 'people' don't just munch across the fingers, still stuck together...?! #sowrong
@StreetPassWNZ after Saturdays Tetris success I had to get my lights back out again to practice more! https://t.co/32YyNTjlx9
Willis Street closed off due to a large window about to shatter in the State insurance building. https://t.co/sltr1HWGOX
@iamjohnoliver sssooo, quite a bit has happened since you've been away. Will the first show be four hours long to try and cover some of it?
Guy who didn't hold doors, just got the access denied sad sound at the entrance. Maybe next time don't be a lift dick? #Poeticjustice #karma
First guy in lift, hold the doors for others, don't be a Trump. #liftmanners
@agentK idiot or totally teched up badass?
@NateSelfie @idigitaltimes now bring an awesome retro version out for the 3DS. Then I can box my SNES back up.
@NateSelfie @agentK definitely, thought battle mode was a really great challenge, especially with 10 players! #shapeshifting
Just watched the trailer for Chips movie and all I can say is fuck you to the asshead who greenlighted its production. #steamingpile
@Ilaeria missed the if at the start! #majorfail
@Ilaeria not at all! Unfair to brand the other three based on one deciding to cheat.
@Ilaeria where did you see that? Had thought it was his relay team mate?
Yes suit guy, press the lift button again, I clearly don't know how to. Also don't wait for people to leave the lift before you.
@blauerpunto @gail_nz have you booked your tickets yet? https://t.co/X28WLwy204
@karoricat Christmas is over, there's no need for more gifts this early.
Love it when you walk that bit quicker to make it to the front of the queue, ahead of the next six people ordering coffee! #winoftheday
When you come in early and there's a desk being built near to you. Always a good start to the day. #desktruption #drillsbangs
@jethrocarr early today he wanted one free range egg. What's tomorrow, a tofu and snow pea salad with chilli jam emulsion?
Today's highlight (so far), being told to go back to South Africa, by regular mumbling street character.
Feel like it's four hairstyles in one day kind of weather out there today #wellington #weatherbomb
I'm so stupid that I can only understand a report on weather if being given by a reporter standing outside in said weather. #thinksonenews
@hadyngreen they can still be worn with jandles! #secondlife
@agentK was it by any chance due to awful tasting coffee? Seems, as a coffee shop, if you can't get that right, then you're screwed.
Anyone else wondering why the wedding of an NZ couple is considered breaking news and of national importance? Must be missing something?
Son listening to a voice memo he just made on the phone. "That is NOT what I just said". #misquoted
@NintendoAUNZ to have residents actually pay for stuff & not expect me to work in a coffee shop also to fund everything. #twojobs
@StreetPassWNZ @kaimaka I've got two different versions on the 3DS, one has competitive mode. @agentK @blauerpunto have it too.
@kaiitlin do you mind the camera showing people standing up, or being taken to the toilet and missing five minutes of movie.. #pirateperils
@StreetPassWNZ surely Tetris needs to feature somewhere?
@agentK @jethrocarr pretty sure I will, can check when I'm home. #thecableguy
Thank you Gotham, for providing the Batman and great coffee too!
I realise everyone closes down for Christmas break, but Starbucks can not be the only option for coffee! #justsayno
Ok, once you reach a certain age, bar staff have the responsibility to refuse to allow you to sit in bean bags... #beanbagrock
@tinytawnykitten LOL! These are actually the one pair of men's ones ordered!
Nothing like the feel of new shoes! #fancyfeet https://t.co/Yhd8OYyYx3
However you say it and whoever you say it to, have a very Merry Christmas in whichever timezone you're in.… https://t.co/pUd8vI0uHl
@agentK @Ilaeria so you're saying, with diapers @karorichook can come into the house? Just checking that... :-)
@karorichook how cool would be that be! Tap on the window and wait to be let in.
@karorichook I feel an All Whites call up in your future.
@karoricat @karorichook now this seems like something you'd both like to use? Send some selfies to the humans to br… https://t.co/0MdLmIMxlx
Awesome surprise from my equally awesome #nzsecretsanta peep! Have been looking for Mabel for ages and here she is… https://t.co/jvgInDTz0z
Penny farthing being ridden round bays at Eastbourne. Can't be the most practical ride on a windy Wellington day. #bikewobbles
@agentK @karoricat you can still hope. Maybe you'll hear sleigh bells on the roof tonight...
Flame throwers, exploding balloons, worlds biggest glow stick and a Big Bang party popper! Can only mean Nanogirl was awesome #nanogirllive
Only in Wellington is the art fashionably attired for the festive season. 🎄#wellyxmas https://t.co/N4v2hKanI6
About to see some awesome science stuff!!! #nanogirllive https://t.co/76tTVNcA62
@nzsecretsanta definitely a Glad wrap self wrapping station. #itsthethoughtthatcounts
@nzsecretsanta has a 'You're a very bad santa' badge been create yet? #nzsecretsanta
Come down to the Wellington Santa activities, there's so much to see... 😳 https://t.co/5mzVPDyTOG
Don't you love finding that super quick, two mouse clicks, short cut method after you've spent hours doing something the long complex way?
@Kristina90 has the toilet been warned to be on stand by?
Just found my chair instructional manual. Couple of lever pulls and adjustments, sssooo much more comfortable sitting now. #chairman
@nzsecretsanta oh no! Will there be a sad Santa badge to replace them?
Is it me, or did I just hear a collective sigh of relief from ponytails country wide... #hairtoday #ponytailtug
My feet seem to be getting a lot of attention today. Can't think why? #trainers https://t.co/szUm1C5qDu
@karoricat do you have tiny teddy bear pads too? https://t.co/kBoSZ2K4Df
You can tell there's no Kereru count on, as I've just driven under 6 big, round Wellington ones along Wilton Road. Bending the phone wires.
Does anyone know where you can buy green lasagne sheets? They all seem to have vanished from supermarkets.
@NateSelfie not those, but @blauerpunto and I have six AC:NL ones to bring to next meet up!
@TheCatTweeting obviously a member of the House Katreides...
Thordon Fair day, so grey and damp as usual! Parked at Picnic, so breakfast to start it all off.
@NewstalkZB got what. Is he saying they've got wood? #lamejokes
@nickjonesnzer not the ponytail man!!!! Make him go away!!! #badhairday
@karorichook was it a good roost, sorry roast? #coffeechook
@runawaykiwi @kim_partridge they seem to have missed off The right to moan and make decisions, before Googling the question? #UKOK?
@nextofficial the U.K. Page shows stock levels, but the NZ one doesn't. Too convoluted to go between two. Will look elsewhere, thanks.
Office guy who sits opposite. STOP making the desk shake! Can't tell if it's an aftershock or just you being a fidgety f*&$! #wobblewars
@nextofficial no problem. Was more frustrating that they said they were available, but became out of stock once dropped in the basket.
@nextofficial major fail online right now. Items showing as in stock change to out of stock once in the basket. Wasted so much time. #fail
That's a good plan. Working from the bottom up always seems to go wrong for some reason... https://t.co/GU7da2yJoY
@nzsecretsanta real people? Not faceless autonomous robots? Will put that oil back & look for something more human friendly! #nzsecretsanta
Damn Wellington, what's up with this wind! #wildweather
@nzsecretsanta Hope Santa provides good medical cover that's definitely an elf and safety issue... #nzsecretsanta
@nzsecretsanta thought so, wanted to offer. You little elves have enough on now, can't have you spontaneously exploding! #nzsecretsanta
@nzsecretsanta mine is awesome, but happy to swap with someone who feels theirs isn't. There's some good in everyone! #nzsecretsanta
@karoricat maybe a chicken or other bird? So be nice! #nzsecretsanta
@gail_nz that cat actually looks fussy too. Like they'd look at what you'd bought and say "yeah, nah, try harder" and judge you on it.
@karoricat are you shopping for your persons already? #nzsecretsanta
Hey wind, try to not make the house move like an aftershock. I like to be able to tell the difference!
The dealers are appearing on streets & people hurriedly searching through change to buy a fix. Can only mean girl guide biscuit season!!
Ok Wellington, it's the weekend, let's try to stay shake free and just chill out a bit.
@Ilaeria nothing worse than second hand lunch smells (when they're yum smelling that is)!
Whenever I feel a slight after shock I instantly look at my glass of water, wondering if, in some Jurassic Park way, it'll verify my view.
@Ilaeria imagine how a proctologist feels... #jobs
@gail_nz asteroid plummeting towards us? Late snow storms? Alien invasion, or maybe more seriously Marmite running out again!!! #nzproblems
@blauerpunto she's in Nooks homes, so get there before it closes! Have you spoken to Isabel at Town Hall, she introduces you to her.
@TheReaganMorris you can also get a bigger range of furniture, from the HHC catalogue. #turningoveranewleaf
@TheReaganMorris if you already have Home Designer you can link it to your AC:NL and use the drag and drop with pen to move things.
Loving the HHC and AC:NL connection. Home renovation is a breeze & my place is looking presentable & ready for the next Streetpass event!
Thanks for the not so gentle reminder #eqnz
@kaiitlin don't forget to draw your torrential rain card and play it! #wellingtonweathergame
A fairly long lasting aftershock there. #eqnz
@gail_nz @agentK mmm, they would be soft and fluffy, but wouldn't they fall feet first, with tiny claws out? 🙄🐱🔪
@gail_nz @agentK with chicken pox here, pestilence is covered. Maybe raining frogs?
@karorichook oh no! That's not good at all! Hope you're all good and the dog has been sent packing!
@flying_geek seems unfair allowing that, if some are closed? Extra revision time or stress from quake?
@Kiwiseabreeze will they survive the day if you take them tomorrow? Or will they vanish bit by bit (or should that be bite by bite?)?
A noticeable aftershock there, just to remind us. Maybe a good day to check eq boxes and grab bag contents. #eqnz
@NintendoAUNZ hey guys, would be fantastic to have the SNES version of Super Bomberman on the 3DS! #retroawesomeness
